data.message: He can walk his ass back out the door, people raise there own children, and also raised others children, he had to drop so low to put down trump, and for what, trump doing good to this world and you all don't want a change, you all want this world to be a shit hole that it has been for years. We are ready for a time of change and it's going to be a good one that's why we voted trump. Go home cry babies, you wanted HILARY that has crumpled her self, made her self look bad, and you wanted her for President. SMH world open your eyes, she is a bad person.
